azurerm_notification_hub.description: Manages a Notification Hub within a Notification Hub Namespace.

name.description: The name to use for this Notification Hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: The name of the Notification Hub Namespace in which to create this Notification Hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the Notification Hub Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The Azure Region in which this Notification Hub Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

application_mode.description: The Application Mode which defines which server the APNS Messages should be sent to. Possible values are `Production` and `Sandbox`.

bundle_id.description: The Bundle ID of the iOS/macOS application to send push notifications for, such as `com.hashicorp.example`.

team_id.description: The ID of the team the Token.

token.description: The Push Token associated with the Apple Developer Account. This is the contents of the `key` downloaded from [the Apple Developer Portal](https://developer.apple.com/account/ios/authkey/

api_key.description: The API Key associated with the Google Cloud Messaging service.

id.description: The ID of the Notification Hub.

create.description: Used when creating the Notification Hub.

update.description: Used when updating the Notification Hub.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Notification Hub.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Notification Hub.
